name: Duudle Mania X-Mas Edition
description:
In Duudle Mania, you steer the Doodle.
Your journey is to control your Duudle and spring up!
Always try to land on the platforms, otherwise your doodle will learn to fly ... to heaven.

So jump up and bring the Highscore home!
Beat your Friends...

How to play:
Tilt to move left or right
